An amazing game experience, if you haven't play this yet you are seriously missing out on one of the highest quality gaming experiences there is.

Mind-blowing at the time it came out, it still holds up today as an immersive, thrilling game that expands on the also excellent but now sadly somewhat dated original.   The graphics aren't as cutting edge as they were on release but still hold up well, helped by some fantastic art direction and sound design.  The pacing is excellent, always changing things up at just the right time to keep things from getting too samey.  The only real downside is the cliffhanger ending, mollified somewhat by the two expansions (sadly the latter ALSO ends on a cliffhanger!) but even all these years later it's still a game I have warm memories of and get the urge to replay every so often.
Awesome.......

For the longest time, people have been talking about how this is the greatest game ever made. Now, I know what they mean. Engaging characters, great gameplay, storyline etc.. Even though this game was released back in 2004, it's still very impressive visually and gameplay wise. This is one of those must have titles if you have a Mac or PC for sure. Same can be said for the episodic series, even if they are a tad short from what I hear.

One of the best single player experiences of all time

A masterpiece, to say the least. The series that put Valve on the map. Without this title, everyday people would not have access to their endless mods, CSS, TF2, GMod, and many others. For its time, Half Life 2 had a great engine running behind it, and still today the engine has many jaw-dropping capabilities. With impeccable physics, AI, and scale. The plot is deep and rich, if you have played all of the Half Life titles, you have only skimmed the surface. One of the few games that I think could be considered on an art level of a poem. The gameplay is great and plays smooth. Puzzles keep this game requiring wits and intelligence. Scripted sequences and random occurences based out of the engine make gameplay unpredictable at times. As well as the greatest atmosphere I have ever experienced in a game ever. A good try. Pick this up to see how Valve came to us today.

Лучшая игра за всю историю Вселенной. ЛУЧШАЯ ИГРА ВСЕЛЕННОЙ! По другому Half-Life 2 описать нельзя никак. Очень большая, сложная, комплексная игра, в которой переплетаются различнае жанры: шутер, головоломки, хоррор, гонки. Но выше всего этого конечно же сюжет: Выверенный до последнего диалога, в котром нету ничего лишнего. Зато есть многочисленный клиффхенгеры. Если вы до сих пор не играли в HL2 - вы неценитель. А если она вам непонравилось - неценитель в квадрате. Я сказал все.

Half-life 2, Half-life 2: Episode One, Half-life 2: Episode Two, Half-life 2: Deathmatch. Sem dúvida, são os melhores games da década de 2000. Digo que serão lembrados por muitos e muitos anos, pois não enjoam. Aliás, todo jogo bom, não enjoa. Serão lançados games mais sofisticados e com gráficos melhores que HL2, mas a jogabilidade, a física envolvida nos movimentos, tornam esse jogo ímpar. Em single player (Half-Life 2, Half-life 2: Episode One e Half-life 2: Episode Two somente), o game ficou ligeiramente mais lento, mais curto e um pouco mais difícil que o primeiro Half-Life. Além disso, o poder de fogo das armas diminuiu. O dano foi reduzido em todas as armas, logo não espere terminar uma partida com 150 frags no mesmo tempo do deathmach do primeiro game. Recomendo!
TL;DR = The game is great, we all know it is great, buy it if you haven't and have some fun playing the game that made VALVe

Игра - чудо. Мечта, новая ступень эволюции жанра. Вы давно не чувствовали ничего подобного. И не скоро почувствуете вновь. Это - революция. Революция не в графике, а в подходе к созданию игры как целого. Она поднимает планку игрового сюжета и процесса на небывалую высоту.

Half-Life 2 возвышает компьютерные игры именно как вид искусства.

Oh man I can't believe this game was truly made and I truly could play it. It's cool. Simply cool. 100%, no less. It's long, it's entertaining, it's mysterious, it's moderately hard to learn to play, it's (mostly) not buggy, it's lovely. I think this should be the core of entire gaming community. The story develops greatly, the game progresses as you go, the enviroment is breathtaking even when you think it's not anymore possible. Simply said, it's been one of the best games I have played ever in my life.

Amazing game.I can't believe I got it so cheap for xmas 2011. I know it was made in 2004 but for me this game still has amazing graphics and beats FPS games released recently. The campaign is  not very open-ended (like Farcry 2 4 example) but it is captivating and well-scripted. You can tell they made this game with huge passion and the zombie level is the best of its kind I have ever played.

Melhor fps que já joguei, Half-Life 2 possui um universo único e que se confunde com outra excelente franquia da Valve, Portal. Os gráficos, embora soem datados, não fazem perder a atmosfera asfixiante, desoladora e opressiva da Cidade 17, propiciando uma imersão absoluta no desenvolvimento da história. Falado nisso, a história é um dos pontos altos do jogo: imperdível para quem gosta de sci-fi. O Capítulo 6, Não vamos para Revenholm, mostra o quanto o jogo influenciou L4D. Enfim, jogar Half-Life 2 é uma experiência completa e renovadora, que certamente vai te tornar mais exigente com os próximos shooters que tiveres em mãos. O jogo reescreve uma página nova na história do gênero e mostra que um fps pode ser muito mais do que andar e atirar. Mais que um excelente jogo, Half-Life 2 é um cult-game do entretenimento eletrônico.
Шедевр VALVe №2
Just when you thought you couldn't make Half Life any better, they made the best series of games I have ever played.
The CLASSIC! amazing story, awesome puzzles, and great fps fun.

The definitive shooter. The best of it's kind. One of the best games ever created. Practically a god given gift. If you chose to buy Mw3 or any other shooter over HL2 and it's episodes, then shame on you. I cannot stress enough how much this game is worth it. It may be simplistic and arcade in style, but it's simplicity is where the fun comes from.

With a surprisingly deep and dark story (where the game only scratches the surface of the true horror of the world Gordon Freeman lives in) and it's classic shooting fun, HL2 and it's episodes are just games that should never be missed.

Here's hoping for EP3. Hurry it up, Gabe Newell.
Best FPS ever

Half-Life 2 is one of the best games I've ever played. The engine offers very high quality graphics with reasonable system requirements. But most of all, the atmosphere of the game is great. It is not as dark as the first part, but almost as challenging. Plus, in this part you can also drive vehicles, which is a nice change from time to time.
The whole reason for steam, basically.

Half Life 2 ist mehr als nur der Nachfolger Half Life's. Es ist das Spiel welches das Half Life Franchise auf eine neue Ebene hebt. Nicht nur die bessere Grafik hat das Spiel so erfolgreich gemacht sondern allgemein  die Atmosphäre die das ganze Spiel über herrscht.  Nur der Endkampf hat sich meiner Meinung nach kein Gold verdient, der fällt zu Half Life 1 hin deutlich ab.

Зачем тратить лишние слова на описание Half-Life 2? Зачем говорить о её потрясающем сюжете, удобном геймплее, ярких персонажах, врезавшихся в память цитатах? Зачем перечислять разнообразие врагов и игровых локаций, интересный арсенал оружия и элементарные, но тем не менее интересные головоломки? В эту игру нужно просто поиграть, и никаких слов о её гениальности не будет нужно. 100 из 100 - шедевр игровой индустрии от Valve, не опозоривший предыдущую часть.
